pullRequest.body:
Add `mgf_ident_distrib`, `mgf_sum_iid`, and `mgf_gaussian`.
These are some of the supporting lemmas we have proved on our way to formalizing the central limit theorem.

I am not sure whether `mgf_sum_iid` really belongs in mathlib. Its proof follows easily from `mgf_ident_distrib` and `mgf_sum` but iid random variables occur commonly enough to warrant special treatment. I am open to removing this lemma from the PR.

I am also not certain that `mgf_gaussian` belongs in this file, and not the [gaussian file](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Probability/Distributions/Gaussian.html). I am open to moving it there. 

Co-authored-by: Siyuan Ge <jamesgsy@uw.edu>

---

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

- ...

Deletions:

- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:

- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
